009
010package imagingbook.pub.sift;
011
012import imagingbook.lib.math.VectorNorm;
013import imagingbook.lib.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
014import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.Collections;
018import java.util.List;
019
020public class SiftMatcher {
021        
022        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
023                /** Specify type of distance norm */
024                public NormType norm = NormType.L2;
025                /** Max. ratio between best and second-best match */
026                public double rMax = 0.8;
027                /** Set true to sort matches */
028                public boolean sort = true;
029        }
030        
031        private final Parameters params;
032        private final SiftDescriptor[] fA;
033        private final VectorNorm am;
034
035        // constructor - using default parameters
036        public SiftMatcher(List<SiftDescriptor> sfA) {
037                this(sfA, new Parameters());
038        }
039        
040        // constructor - using specific parameters
041        public SiftMatcher(List<SiftDescriptor> sfA, Parameters params) {
042                this.fA = sfA.toArray(new SiftDescriptor[0]);
043                this.params = params;
044                am = params.norm.create();
045        }
046        
047        public List<SiftMatch> matchDescriptors(List<SiftDescriptor> sfB) {
048                SiftDescriptor[] fB = sfB.toArray(new SiftDescriptor[0]);
049                List<SiftMatch> matches = new ArrayList<SiftMatch>(fA.length);
050                                
051                for (int i = 0; i < fA.length; i++) {
052                        SiftDescriptor si = fA[i];
053                        int i0 = -1;
054//                      int i1 = -1;
055                        double d0 = Double.MAX_VALUE;
056                        double d1 = Double.MAX_VALUE;
057                        
058                        for (int j = 0; j < fB.length; j++) {
059                                double d = dist(si, fB[j]);
060                                if (d < d0) {   // new absolute minimum distance
061//                                      i1 = i0;        // old best becomes second-best
062                                        d1 = d0;
063                                        i0 = j;
064                                        d0 = d;
065                                }
066                                else // not a new absolute min., but possible second-best
067                                        if (d < d1) { // new second-best
068//                                              i1 = j;
069                                                d1 = d;
070                                        }
071                        }
072//                      if (i1 >= 0 && d1 > 0.001 && d0/d1 < params.rho_max) 
073                        if (Double.isFinite(d1) && d1 > 0.001 && d0/d1 < params.rMax) {
074                                SiftDescriptor s0 = fB[i0];
075                                SiftMatch m = new SiftMatch(si, s0, d0);
076                                matches.add(m);
077                        }
078                }
079                if (params.sort) {
080                        Collections.sort(matches);  // sort matches to ascending distance d1
081                }
082                
083                return matches;
084        }
085        
086        double dist(SiftDescriptor d1, SiftDescriptor d2) {
087                //final ArrayMatcher matcher = params.norm.matcher;
088                return am.distance(d1.getFeatures(), d2.getFeatures());
089        }
090
091}
